attributes.action: Keep the Legal Driving Age At 17
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am 15 Now And Been Looking Forward To Driving For 2 Years And Hearing They Want To Put It Up As Absolutly Desgraced Me!!
I Think The Priminister As Rect Us!!
More Kids Have Started To Vandelise Due To Drink And Smokin Ages
As The Government Do Not Do Enough For Us!!
I Think It Is So Stupid To Put The Driving Age Up And I Think Alot Of People Would Agree!!
Its Totally Stupid
I Dont Smoke Myself Buh I got Mates That Do And Putting The Smoking Age Up Is Terrible Too Because Its Kids Choices If They Want To Become Really Ill Not The Government!!

Drivin Isd Important To Alot Of Kids These Days!!
Give Us a Hobby To Do!!
Let Us Kit Up Our Own Cars And Have Meeting Spots To Look At Each Others Cars And Stop Takin Everything Away From Us Kids!!
Do Something Good For A Changee!!

rejection.details: Please use a full name and please use lowercase letters in the description.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
